name: The Get Out Kids
description:
It’s the fall of 1984. Molly and her dog Moses sneak out in the middle of the night to meet their friend Salim. A midnight showing of "Ghostblasters" at the Capitol 6 Drive-In is the night’s big-ticket event.

When Moses goes missing under suspicious circumstances, Molly and Salim set out on a rescue mission that will challenge their friendship and change their lives forever.

The Get Out Kids is a narrative puzzle experience. An original story, each chapter unfolds within a 3D diorama, leading to a conclusion you will never see coming.
